name: LD50-BetterAI
description:
You're a new employee at an AI company and are tasked with turning off a malfunctioning AI for maintenance. Because of typical first-day-at-work luck the AI turns on everyone and tries to escape and it's up to you to stop (or delay) the destruction it can cause!

MAINFRAME no. 233A / INSTRUCTIONS: - Close/open the terminal with the [ESC] key; - Enter commands and press the [ENTER] key to execute them; - To turn off the AI for maintenance work, disconnect the cables by dragging them out from connection sockets using mouse click & drag; - Look around the mainframe by using second mouse click and drag;
